pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. image:: logo.pngRohmu is a Python library for building backup tools for databasesproviding functionality for compression, encryption and transferringdata between the database and an object storage. Rohmu supports mainpublic clouds such as GCP, AWS and Azure for backup storage. Rohmu isused in various backup tools such as`PGHhoard <https://github.com/aiven/pghoard>`__ for PostgreSQL,`MyHoard <https://github.com/aiven/myhoard>`__ for MySQL and`Astacus <https://github.com/aiven/astacus>`__ for M3 and ClickHouse andother databases.Features========- Supported object storages: Azure, GCP, S3, Swift (OpenStack), local file storage and SFTP.- Supported compression algorithms: Snappy, `zstd <https://github.com/facebook/zstd>`__ and `lzma <https://docs.python.org/3/library/lzma.html>`__.Requirements============Rohmu requires Python >= 3.8. For Python library dependencies, have alook at`requirements.txt <https://github.com/aiven/rohmu/blob/main/requirements.txt>`__.Usage example=============*Add usage example here*For real-world usage you can have a look at `how Rohmu is used inPGHoard <https://github.com/aiven/pghoard/blob/main/pghoard/basebackup.py>`__.Development===========*TODO*License=======Rohmu is licensed under the Apache license, version 2.0.
